meanings.sent1: The unremembered song played softly in the background.
meanings.sent2: The unremembered name faded into the distance.
meanings.sent3: The unremembered task turned into a mystery game.
meanings.sent4: Her unremembered face haunted his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The unremembered promise lingered in the air, unfulfilled.

meanings.definition: Not recalled or brought to mind
meanings.sent1: The unremembered details of the story puzzled the listeners.
meanings.sent2: His unremembered words left her feeling confused.
meanings.sent3: The unremembered password led to a comical situation.
meanings.sent4: The unremembered melody danced on the edge of his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The unremembered appointment slipped through his mind like sand.
